title: Did Sean Spiceer say that Hitler did not use chemical weapons in "the crowded Germans "?
subtitle: A supposed "clarification" by Sean Spesser regarding his remarks about Hitler and chemical weapons was posted on the Facebook page Trick.
author: David Emery
vclaim: In a failed attempt to clarify his earlier statements about Adolf Hitler and chemical weapons, Press Secretary Trump Sean Speiser said that he meant Hitler never to use it on the "Fello Germans."
